title: Which K-POP light-sticks are your favourite? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apink's Panda BongTheir light stick is so adorable! The pink hue the lightstick emits when switched on makes it more cute. To be honest, this light stick really mirrors their image/concept. What's more, the light stick has 2 colours; strawberry pink infront and basic white at the back with their group's logo.     SHINee's Shating Star (1st ver)Okay, so I heard that SHINee members themselves name their own light stick as Shating Star and I'm shooketh XD well, their choice tho. Anyway, I love their 1st version much more because just look at their light stick. IT TOTALLY SHINES LIKE A DIAMOND WITH IT'S SKY BLUE COLOUR. I dislike their 2nd version tho, their light stick began to lose its uniqueness. :( (sorry shawols, not meant to be offensive)    Winner's I.C Stick (1st ver)I have to include Winner's on this list because damn their light stick doesn't look like one at all. It looks like a freakin trophy with a huge blue ‘W’ on top, so damn elegant and cool. Winner boys treat us like champions for winning their hearts with this trophy-like light stick (oof). And the colour makes a nebula blue ocean during concerts, the colour of the galaxy.    So I kinda have mixed feelings for the newest version of their light stick. Is it just me or does it looks somehow like an ice cream? XD but it's okay.  MYNAME's Mic BongThis is the first time I've heard of MYNAME but truly their light stick made me go ‘oh wow’. It gives me the old singer vibe from the 80's.   2PM's Lightstick (1st ver)I don't know what the name is and I'm so frustrated XD and their light stick ocean pictures are so hard to find. Their light stick resembles their fandom's name, Hottest. And for me it truly lives up to the word ‘lightstick’. You know, that small ember-like top (resembles light) and the stick-like bottom of the light stick *kicked* oh yeah it reminds me of torches too. But this is one cool torch   Blackpink's Hammer BongI'm not a blink despite being a YG stan (I stan the artists under him only) but I definitely love their light stick! And apparently this is the 2nd weapon-inspired light stick made under YG, designed by Blackpink themselves. Truly deserving for their image. If you can afford just the light stick, then you could hit the bouncers to enter their concert for free with this (kidding).   Btob's Saxophone StickThis one is unexpected. Aside from weapons we also have speakers. It suits their loud nature tho XD But this is one of the most unique light stick I have ever found. And it's blue too (i have a strong favoritism towards the colour blue)    Beast's Rose Bong and Highlight's Light Bulb Light StickThey are like romantic sweethearts in this case. And their light bulb light stick is so simple yet classy. It has that steam punk and Einstein vibes to it.   I.O.I's Ice Cream BongThis. Is. To. Die. For. Since I love ice creams, this light stick looks so yummy and pretty that I would risk spending my money for it.   iKON's KonbatYep, this is the first weapon-inspired light stick made under YG. And this light stick mimics the members’ personalities plus the group's image accurately; aggresive and powerful on the outside (hence the baseball bat motive), warm and energetic (the colour of the light stick: dark orange and red) on the inside. They look so powerful and passionate on the stage but actually warm human beings with loud voices and whole lots of energy off-stage/behind cameras/off-cameras.    So apparently they have KRUNK versions for Konbats and I almost screamed. I'm a big fan of KRUNK :(   Bigbang's Bang Bong/Crown Light Stick (4th ver)The first ever customized light stick made in kpop history is this, Bang Bong or the Crown light stick claimed by many! Honestly I came to know that the actual name for their light stick is Bang when I searched for pictures of it XD Their yellow crown suits their title as the King of K-pop and boy it really looks majestic. There are so many versions but I like this one the best.  YG too came out with a different head for this light stick, for their 10th anniversary. And man it looks even more royal than before xD   And that's it!

I'll list my top 5 of girl groups, and then top 5 of boy groups. These are in no particular order, they're all so pretty and I can't pick just one. FEMALE 1.) IZ*ONE  I love the idea of each member having a color, and when you turn it on they all mix together to create a beautiful rainbow light. The gold band is also a great detail, and I love the shape. The band and handle also come in individual colors, so you can decorate your lightstick with your bias' color! 2.) Apink  The panda design is so cute, and I love how simple it is! When you turn this on, the pink parts light up with a really pretty pink color. The back is also so beautiful, the glitter adds such a nice touch. 3.) Oh My Girl  This design is so unique and elegant, I love it so much! The stag is such a creative idea, this lightstick is very aesthetically pleasing. When you turn it on, it lights up in a very pretty blueish color. The packaging is beautiful too. 4.) 2NE1  I know that 2NE1 disbanded, but their lightstick is so unique and sleek! The gold detailing really matches their concept, and the wings are so pretty. Overall, a very outstanding and badass lightstick. 5.) Red Velvet  Red Velvet's lightstick is pretty basic, but I love it! When you turn it on, it lights up in a nice peachy pink color. The glitter makes it even cuter, and I also really like the shape! BOYS 1.) Samuel  I really love the shape and silver detailing on this lightstick. The red is also such a gorgeous shade, and it really matches Samuel. This is a very underappreciated lightstick, I don't stan but I would buy this! 2.) Seventeen  Seventeen's lightsticks are known for being beautiful, but their new version is seriously on another level. The texture on the handle adds so much, and the gem and glitter is so pretty! I love the colors, too, it really matches their concept. 3.) VIXX  This is such a sleek and elegant lightstick. The dark blue color is so beautiful, and the gold designing makes it seem even more fancy. This lightstick has a space theme, when you turn it on it lights up dark blue and casts white spots, like little stars. 4.) Monsta X  I'm so excited for Monsta X's new lightstick design, it’s so gorgeous! The black detailing looks so good, and when you turn it on it lights up a really pretty iridescent color. It also matches their concept well. 5.) iKon  I might be one of few people who love this lightstick, but to me it's so unique. It's a pretty orange-red color, and it lights up orange from the top and bottom. Yet another one that matches the concept well, I also love the shape.

Here are some of my favourite lightsticks in k-pop! Oh My Girl  So beautiful! The glitter and the simplicity of the lightstick is what I love the most. Seventeen (Ver 1)  One of my favourite lightsticks! I also love how Carat’s are able to take off the lid and add things inside! Ateez  This lightstick is so pretty! I love the combination of gold and black! Stray Kids  My ult group uwu I love the compass design and the red and white! TXT  I know some people dislike this lightstick because it looks too childish, but I love the colours and the glitter! I also love the idea of retractability! Apink  I love the panda design and the pink and white combo. On of the most iconic lightsticks in k-pop if you ask me. Twice (Ver 1)  I miss their old lightstick so much! This one was so cute TT BTS (MOTS:7 Ver)  TBH I don’t know what I really like about this lightstick. Something about it just appeals to me. Cosmic Girls  This lightstick is adorable! I love the ring around the heart and the colour it glows! Also, GLITTER!!!!!! —naeun ♡

Here are my favorite lightsticks of K-Pop! Bang Bong (Bigbang)   THE Firts K-Pop lightstick. So fckn cool. I’m digging thr crown shape and the yellow color. ARMY Bomb (BTS)   Well, since I’m an ARMY it’s only natural for me to love my own fandom’s. It has a simple design but recognizable. And the big circular lamp part makes it beautiful when shines (idk if this makes sense, English is not my first language). MooMoo Bong (Mamamoo)  Who else would thought to make a RADISH as their lightstick? Only Mamamoo. Talking about extra. Genius. Candy Bong (Twice)  One word: cute!  While for Candy Bong Z they make the design more mature and elegant, Fancy! EXO Lightstick (EXO)   Simpel and elegant, also recognizable. And the most important thing, the lamp is bright! Carat Bong (Seventeen)  SO PRETTY! And I like how the lid is detachable so you can kinda put decorations inside. Here are some examples of Carats getting creative with their lightstick:     So pretty. And last but not least…     Hot Potato (N. Flying) Hands down. THE BEST K-POP lightstick. No explanation needed.  Roughly translated from my answer in Quora Indonesia with some additions: Jawaban Hanna Maryam untuk Lightstick grup idola KPop manakah yang menjadi favoritmu?

upvoters.user_id: Hera Ahmed Raja حِرا احمد راجہ

response.answer_text: Lightsticks can honestly be good or bad and there is really no in-between. This is my personal opinion. Other people might not agree! BLACKPINK I really like the BLACKPINK lightstick. A lot of people don’t but I think it’s adorable.  BTS I really really like the BTS lightstick (ARMY Bomb) and one of my friends said it looked like a gumball machine haha. It took me a really long time to realize that it was a bomb.  SEVENTEEN I like how adorable this one is and I like how people decorate them it’s super cute!    MAMAMOO AH Mamamoo’s lightstick is so adorable!  TWICE They recently came out with the Candy Bong Z and it’s so cute!  IZ*ONE I find IZ*ONEs lightstick super cute and aesthetically pleasing because, a) it’s so simple but still effective and cute. and b) the little balls are so adorable and I love the design. Also, I love IZ*ONE so it’s a win-win situation.

I actually have two. I don’t stan these groups, but their lightsticks are beautiful. “The Seventeen Carat Bong” You can’t tell me that’s not aesthetically pleasing. I’m in love with this lightstick.  These lightsticks are also customizable; that provides fans with the opportunities to customize theirs like this fan did. The custom ones are so pretty! 2. The Monsta X Lightstick.  You can’t tell me that’s not ethereal.  These lightsticks are also customizable. I’ve seen fans make the lights even more beautiful than they already are with their personal customizations. Overall, these lightsticks are my personal two favorites. Just look at them! - L.

upvoters.user_id: Rose バイオレット Gacha

response.answer_text: I had this in my answer later so I could collect some good answers. First: Shinee. I really love their light stick and it describes the fandom perfectly.  #2 would be iKons bat. I think a lot of people don’t like it but I actually think it’s cute.  #3 would be Seventeens light stick! I know it’s a popular one.  #4 would be the light stick for EXO, I like both versions of it.  #5 would be Monsta X! It’s so beautiful. I like the first version of it, but the newer one is nice too.  #6 would be Got7  #7 would be the light stick for bigbang  I’m looking forward to light sticks from Ateez, Stray Kids, (G)I-dle, and I’m curious what TXT will have. Edit: So Stray Kids does have a light stick coming! I also forgot to add in the new official light stick for Sunmi:

I’ve wanted to get my hand on WJSN’s lightstick for the longest time now. The color combination is literally perfect. In my opinion, I think it’s the prettiest one out there right now.  Pentagon’s lightstick is extremely aesthetically pleasing too. The lopsided ring around the circle looks super cool. I love the color and it sort of looks like a tiny castle!  ~flavor
THESE ARE MY FAVOURITES  THESE ARE MY BEST

I like blackpink’s lightstick. It looks like a hammer. i have over 12 lightsticks as a multi fandom and out of them all I also adore Apink’s (panda) Exo’s(unique design)& iKon’s (bat). Although Nct has the awkward Popsicle lightstick.. one pro is you can open it and put lights and other things inside! but every lightstick is so unique and reflects their love of the fans
These three are my fave and I like it because they’re pretty. 1.- Monsta X Lightstick -Mondoongie-   2.- WJSN Lightstick:   3.- Carat Bong
VIXX’s lightstick is beautiful in a concert setting and just in general  Most memorable “lightstick” would go to N.Flying though
Dreamcatcher (I love them too much y’all)
SHINee  (G)I-DLE  Red Velvet  Seventeen  EXO  Monsta X  Pentagon  BTS  Hope you enjoyed reading this. :)
